about_the_game:
New rule: The game is... is a fast-paced twin-stick shooter where you choose a rule to change. And when you die, instead of it being Game Over, you choose how to respawn.

Prepare for:

  • 10 levels in a variety of scenarios and places.
  • Instead of gaining levels, collect rule points
  • Rule points allow you to change the game rules
  • On death, you choose a rule on how to respawn
  • Unlock more rules as you complete levels
  • The terrain is constantly changing
  • 3D graphics with voxels and lots of dynamic light effects!

Do you have what it takes to adapt, survive and come out on top? Pick up your gun, and find out!

name: New rule: The game is...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.3 or newer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Twin-stick shooter where you get rule points instead of levels, and you choose which rules to change. Upon dying, it's not Game Over: you get to choose how to respawn.
